pr_title: Fixing the way we handle testing configurations vs validating configurations

timeline.message: Fixing the way we handle testing configurations vs validating configurations. Fixing the way we display detailed error messages in the UI.

timeline.bodyText: Might be nice to use the same errorIsDetailed variable name here as in GlobalConfiguration so it's obvious that they represent the same thing.
timeline.author: gkillough

timeline.bodyText: Why not destructure all of these and then just map them to the correct name in the return?
timeline.author: gkillough

replies.bodyText:
message is defined as a const below on line 19 so we cant' destructure without a variable conflict.  In order to destructure but we would have to use a different variable name and syntax to set the message property in the response object.
'message': responseMessage
replies.author: psantos1113
